DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To assess efficacy cyclosporine ophthalmic emulsion ( Restasis® ) prevention ocular graft-versus-host disease patient undergone allogeneic stem cell transplantation hematologic malignancy bone marrow failure disorder . Secondary - To correlate Ocular Surface Disease Index clinical ophthalmologic examination . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord age , type transplant ( related v unrelated ) , intensity transplant ( ablative v ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive cyclosporine ophthalmic emulsion ( Restasis® ) drop eye twice daily 1 year transplant . - Arm II : Patients receive placebo ophthalmic drop eye twice daily 1 year transplant . Patients arm may also receive artificial tear drop least twice daily clinically necessary .
